job_description.details:
Location: Bethesda, MD

Position Summary
We are seeking a talented Graphic Designer to join a dynamic team supporting a prominent research and development organization in Bethesda, MD. The ideal candidate will utilize their creativity, technical skills, and communication expertise to develop innovative visual communication materials that effectively convey both technical and non-technical ideas to diverse audiences.

Key Responsibilities:
Communication Strategy & Planning:
Develop and implement communication strategies that align with organizational goals and objectives.
Create visual and written content tailored to various audiences and distribution channels.
Content Development & Design:
Design engaging content, including infographics, scientific posters, internal newsletters, meeting materials, and signage.
Create visual communication products such as branding materials, PowerPoint presentations, scientific figures, and illustrations.
Develop specialized illustrations and graphics covering complex subject matters for diverse audiences.
Collaborate on internal and external messaging, highlighting organizational achievements and capabilities.
Media & Content Analysis:
Monitor and evaluate media campaign performance using traditional and social media metrics.
Provide actionable insights to enhance communication strategies.
Web and Social Media Management:
Maintain and update content on internal and external websites and social media platforms.
Coordinate photographic and videographic resources to capture and share engaging media content.
Manage site design, content updates, and security protocols for digital platforms.

Qualifications
Education: Bachelor’s degree in Biology, Molecular Biology, Graphic Design, Commercial Art, or a related field.
Skills and Expertise:
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, SharePoint, and design tools such as BioRender, Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and Canva.
Demonstrated ability to visually communicate scientific and non-technical ideas to general and specialized audiences.
Strong written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to design scientific and technical materials for diverse purposes, including press releases, web content, newsletters, and multimedia scripts.

This role provides the opportunity to make a meaningful impact by translating scientific achievements into compelling visual and written narratives. If you’re passionate about combining creativity with science to make complex information accessible, we want to hear from you



PriceSenz is an Equal Opportunity Employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, age, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, or disability.
